info.title: Wavecell SMS
info.description:
Wavecell SMS API allows registered users to send SMS worldwide using a simple , fast and reliable  HTTP API.

Send messages in minutes - Get your free trial at : http://www.wavecell.com

get.description: This API should be used to retrieve the current delivery status of a message sent using Wavecell.

parameters.name: umid
parameters.description: The Unique Message ID of the SMS for which you want to retrieve the delivery status

get.description: Send a SMS message using Wavecell HTTP GET

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The destination phone number (MSISDN) to send to. This must be in international format without "+" such as 33123456789. 33 is the country code and 123456789 is the mobile number

parameters.name: encoding
parameters.description: The encoding format of the message

parameters.name: scheduleddatetime
parameters.description: Specify this if you wish to schedule your message up to 7 days in advance, to be specified in UTC Time. Specify this parameter blank if you do not want to schedule your message. SET 0 IF NOT REQUIRED

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: This is the sender Id the message will appear from, TPOA. Only available on agreed routes with your account manager.

post.description: Send a SMS messaging using Wavecell HTTP POST
